intro:
My name is Mehdi.
I'm a Front-End developer
Working remotely
description: I've been working as a Front-End Developer for more than 4 years and I have experience in creating websites and web applications and working with small and large-scale companies. I can create web applications with Javascript, Vue, React and Nodejs. I Like programming, reading books, listening to music, watching movies, photography, playing games, and traveling.
